arrrgh - stress


20040420_23000574
Originally uploaded by grange85.

I had Grade 3 my piano exam on Saturday afternoon. On Sat morning all alone in the house I sounded like Ashkenazy or Monk - by Sat afternoon in front of two strangers I sounded like Les Dawson.

I have my fingers crossed that I've scraped through but I'm not convinced. Onto Grade 4 and time to start addressing my performance anxiety
